name: Moonhorselight
description:
In this game you are playing as the knight Arthur.

He is on the quest to save moonhorse and his friends.

While this is alpha 1, i will be adding more features and levels

as i can, there is also a special challenge, collect the blue coins!

And you can double jump for a unlimited time!  So don't worry about falling to your

death.  You CAN'T Die in this game!

I would also like to thank lil'job and Eric Skiff for their amazing music.
